person.persName: John C. Coon (Cleveland, Ohio, attorney & U.S. Army paymaster)

body.p: Cleveland, Ohio, attorney and soldier. Ballston Spa, New York, native. Son of Matthew Coon and Alba Cinda Lyon Coon. Married to Martha A. S. Coon. Father of George W. Coon. Attorney in Cleveland, Ohio, in 1860. Served in the U.S. Army as Paymaster from 1861 to 1865.
